org.gradoop.dataintegration.transformation.impl

Class Neighborhood

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.dataintegration.transformation.impl.Neighborhood

  • public class Neighborhood
extends Object
    This class contains everything related to the neighborhood of vertices. A vertex pojo, edge direction and a method to calculate the neighborhood of all vertices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Neighborhood.EdgeDirection
      A simple ENUM which contains possible edge directions viewed from the central vertex.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Neighborhood()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      This methods returns a DataSet containing a tuple where the first part is a vertex and the second one a list of all neighbors of this vertex.

    • Method Detail

      • getPerVertex

        public static org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<org.apache.flink.api.java.tuple.Tuple2<EPGMVertex,List<NeighborhoodVertex>>> getPerVertex(LogicalGraph graph,
                                                                                                                                          org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMVertex> centralVertices,
                                                                                                                                          Neighborhood.EdgeDirection edgeDirection)
        This methods returns a DataSet containing a tuple where the first part is a vertex and the second one a list of all neighbors of this vertex. The vertices are derived from the centralVertices DataSet while the List elements are taken from the graph.
        Parameters:
        graph - A Graph the operation is executed on.
        centralVertices - The vertices the neighborhood should be calculated for.
        edgeDirection - The relevant direction for neighbors.
        Returns:
        A Dataset of tuples containing vertices and their neighborhood.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
